DataElement.preferredName: Other Disease or Disorder Therapeutic Procedure Requirement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to any abnormal condition of the body or mind that requires treatment as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Other Disease or Disorder Therapeutic Procedure Requirement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Requirement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have evidence of
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have evidence of another malignancy or benign tumor requiring chemotherapy or radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have other active malignancy, except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma-in-situ of the cervix, OR patient has a history of a prior malignancy and is receiving other specific treatment (except hormonal therapy) for their cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have any other active malignancy other than the endometrial cancer, that is progressing or requiring active treatment with the exception of basal or squamous cell skin cancer, superficial bladder cancer, carcinoma in situ of any site?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have another malignancy requiring active therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of a prior malignancy requiring intervention in the past 3 years, except for cutaneous malignancies that require resection, such as squamous cell carcinoma, basal cell carcinoma, or cutaneous melanoma?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have any other disease, metabolic dysfunction, physical examination finding, or clinical laboratory finding that contraindicates the use of an investigational drug, may affect the interpretation of the results, or may render the patient at high risk from treatment complications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have another malignancy currently being treated or likely to be treated in next 6 months with the exception of basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin or cervical carcinoma in situ and patients receiving hormonal therapy for prevention of hormone-sensitive cancers?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a known additional malignancy that is progressing or requires active treatment, except for basal cell carcinoma of the skin, squamous cell carcinoma of the skin, or carcinoma in situ (e.g., breast carcinoma, cervical cancer) that has undergone potentially curative therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have other active malignancy requiring treatment, except for cutaneous malignancies that require resection, such as squamous cell carcinoma, basal cell carcinoma, or cutaneous melanoma, and except for prostate cancer if only on androgen deprivation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a known additional malignancy that is progressing or requires active treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex -  10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have either recurrent disease or a new primary squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck within a previously irradiated area (radiotherapy to dose greater than or equal to 40 Gy, i.e., in-field recurrence)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require therapy, as determined by the treating physician, following at least one line of treatment?
